wikipedia_page.main: Catherine "Cat" Sandion (born September 8 1985 London England) is a British television presenter. She is of Mauritian heritage. She began presenting in 2008, starting a television career as a member of the first version in Britain of the hit children's television show in Australia, Hi-5. Sandion began presenting CBeebies in January 2013.From 2017-2018, Sandion presented a show on CBeebies called Magic Door. In 2016 she joined the cast of Justin's House for the fourth series.

response: *The South African feed uses former UK presenter Sid Sloane. Cat Sandion also presented on this feed before becoming a presenter on the UK version.
*The Turkish feed uses the UK presenters (eg, Cat Sandion) dubbed over with Turkish voice actors.
*2019/2020 - Buttons in Cinderella (Fairfield Halls, Croydon) with Ore Oduba, Cat Sandion.
